items.content_html: A lightweight RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js for managing tasks. Supports full CRUD operations, in-memory data storage, input validation, and proper error handling. Ideal for learning or prototyping task management systems.

items.content_html: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
items.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX.  It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead.  Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
